boardgame.name: Marvel Dice Masters: Uncanny X-Men
boardgame.description: Marvel Dice Masters: Uncanny X-Men is a collectible dice-building tabletop game designed by Quarriors! creators Michael Elliott and Eric M. Lang._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In this game _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; which features Wolverine, Magneto, Cyclops, Iceman, Psylocke, the Sentinels and more _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; each player fields a superhero team, with each hero being represented by custom-tooled dice; each team must be composed of 15 dice, and a player can _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;purchase_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; dice only from his team. Each hero also has one or more character reference cards, which show the special abilities for the characters based on the die rolls. Different versions of these cards will be available in booster packs, allowing for more customization of your team. Players use these dice to collect energy, recruit new heroes, and battle head-to-head. In addition, each player brings two basic action cards to the game, which are placed in the center of the table; both players can purchase these cards. A player wins once the opposing player has been reduced to zero life._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The Marvel Dice Masters: Uncanny X-Men starter set comes with 44 custom dice, 38 cards, two dice bags, and a core rulebook. Booster packs include two dice with two matching character cards._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

All in Excellent Condition and cards stored in sleeves. Selling in different lots/offers. Marvel Dice Masters: Uncanny X-Men Items: 1) Option 1: $12 Complete Starter set, unopened. 2) Option 2: $5 Common Card Set (Includes 1 of each common card i.e. 28 cards). 3) Option 3: $10 Common Dice Set (Includes 1 die for each common card i.e. 28 dice). 4) Option 4: $10 UnCommon Card Set (Includes 1 of each Uncommon card i.e. 32 cards). 5) Option 5: $15 UnCommon Dice Set (Includes 1 die of each UnCommon card i.e. 32 dice). 6) Option 6: $5 for each rare card. Have following Rares: #96 Apocalypse Time of Testing, #97 Bishop XSE, #98 Black Panther Diversion, #101 Emma Frost Graceful, #102 Falcon Air Strike, #103 Iron Man Superhero, #104 Magik Redflag, #105 Marvel Girl Telepath, #106 Mister Sinister Nathaniel Essex, #107 Mystique Alias:You, #109 Professor X Trainer, #110 Psylocke Kwannon the Assassin, #112 Red Hulk Superhero, #113 Sabretooth Superpowered, #115 Sentinel Robot, #116 She-Hulk Superhero, #119 Toad Mortimer Toynbee, #120 Vision Victor Shade Marvel Dice Masters: Avengers vs. X-Men Items: 1) Option 1: Common Card Set: $5. Includes 1 of each common card (i.e. 30 cards). 2) Option 2: Common Dice Set: $10. Includes 1 die of each common card (i.e. 30 dice). 3) Option 3: UnCommon Card Set: $10 Includes 1 of each Uncommon card (i.e. 34 cards). 4) Option 4: UnCommon Dice Set: $15 Includes 1 die for each UnCommon card except (a) Will include dice from Uncanny version for Captain America, Iron Man, Spider man, and Storm characters, (b) Don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t have dice for Beast, Hulk, Human Torch, and Thor Characters. (Total of 30 different dice). 5) Option 5: Rare Cards: $5 per each rare. Have following Rares: #99 Angel Soaring, #103 Deadpool Chiyonosaki, #104 Doctor Doom Victor, #110 Hawkeye Robin Hood, #112 Magneto Sonderkommando, #119 Professor X Charles Francis Xavier, #120 Punisher Big Nothing, #123 Thing Idol of Millions, #126 Wolverine Formerly Weapon Ten, #127 Mjolnir Thor_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Hammer. Shipping _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Handling: $1 if buying 4 or fewer cards; $8 for everything else.

I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m selling my collection of the Uncanny X-Men Dice Masters. I have the starter set, and 64 boosters. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m selling everything. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m not holding any rares or ultra rares back. The two ultra rares I have are Scarlet Witch and Emma Frost. They will ship in the hard card sleeves you see them pictured in.
